text:
The 2020 presidential campaign of Michael Bennet, the senior United States Senator from Colorado, began on May 2, 2019, when Bennet announced that he would be running in the Democratic primaries.
On May 2, 2019, Bennet announced that he would seek the Democratic nomination for president during an interview on "CBS This Morning".
He ended his campaign on February 11, 2020 after a poor performance in the New Hampshire primaries.
